Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 95
Cwe : 0
IsExecutable : false
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 1
PackageId : 8
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList encode = Find_URL_Encode() + Find_HTML_Encode();
encode += Find_Methods().FindByShortName("*encode*", false) - Find_Methods().FindByShortName("*unencode*", false);

result = encode;
